description: This file defines a React component 'AdminUsers' used for managing users and their roles within an admin interface. It includes state management, API calls to load and modify user data, and rendering of a form and a table of users.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches user data from the server and updates the component state.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new user with the current form data and reloads the user list.

methods.name: updateRoles
methods.description: Updates roles for a specific user and reloads the updated list upon success.
